When [Somnalu](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1737) is defeated, its central eye abandons its dying body to create an ethereal body from the wisps of dreams. Over centuries—or sooner, if it can find a powerful source of nightmares—it can re-form a full body and return to its corporeal self. **[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 38 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 33 [Somnalu Oculus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1738) **Source** [Monsters of Myth](/Sources.aspx?ID=107) pg. 88 **Perception** +26; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13); (can't speak any language), [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 60 feet **Skills** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +23, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +26 **Str** +3 **Dex** +5 **Con** +3 **Int** +7 **Wis** +6 **Cha** +5 --- **AC** 28 **Fort** +18 **Ref** +21 **Will** +24 **HP** 240 , regeneration [](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=26) 10 (deactivated by [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Weaknesses** piercing 10 **Scrutinizing Presence** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) 60 feet, DC 34. The Somnalu Oculus scrutinizes creatures around it, causing them to falter with nervousness and self-doubt. Upon entering the emanation, a creature must attempt a Will save. On a failed save, the creature is [stupefied 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) for 1 round. Regardless of the result of the saving throw, the creature is temporarily immune to scrutinizing presence for 1 minute.
**Clearing Blink** **Trigger** The Somnalu Oculus would be affected by a condition; **Effect** The Somnalu Oculus rapidly blinks, using dream wisps as an eyelid. The Somnalu Oculus attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) the source of the condition with a counteract modifier of +24 and a counteract level of 8. It can't use Clearing Blink again for 1d4 rounds. --- **Speed** fly 40 feet **Melee** dream tendril +22 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d10+9 bludgeoning **Ranged** dream bolt +22 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 2d12+7 piercing **Occult Prepared Spells** DC 34, attack +26 - **Cantrips (6th)** [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334) - **1st** [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Phantom Pain](/Spells.aspx?ID=220) (×2), [Sleep](/Spells.aspx?ID=288) (×2) - **2nd** [Animus Mine](/Spells.aspx?ID=567) (×2), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) (×2) - **3rd** [Agonizing Despair](/Spells.aspx?ID=665) (×2), [Paralyze](/Spells.aspx?ID=213) (×2) - **4th** [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Nightmare](/Spells.aspx?ID=208), [Phantasmal Killer](/Spells.aspx?ID=219), [Rebounding Barrier](/Spells.aspx?ID=813) (×2) - **5th** [Black Tentacles](/Spells.aspx?ID=23) (×2), [Strange Geometry](/Spells.aspx?ID=719) (×3), [Synaptic Pulse](/Spells.aspx?ID=327) - **6th** [Lure Dream](/Spells.aspx?ID=1091) (×2), [Repulsion](/Spells.aspx?ID=254), [Vibrant Pattern](/Spells.aspx?ID=357) (×2)
